QuestData.Title: Skyreach
QuestData.Description: High Sage Viryx has finished a devastatin' crystal superweapon atop the highest point in Skyreach in Spires of Arak. She intends to eradicate the 'lesser races' in the name of their god Rukhmar.$B$BThe arakkoa outcasts were nearly wiped out in mere seconds by the weapon. You must stop Viryx before she turns her sights to your garrison!
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat High Sage Viryx in Skyreach.
